synopsis.text: He ir to the powerful Onigashima yakuza family, Hikaru Nakayama, reunites with his orphaned twin sister, Hinako, with an unusual request: to impersonate him at Shishiku Academy, a prestigious all-boys school notorious for its unruly students. With their father's strict expectations and the threat of death for defiance, Hikaru seeks an escape from the delinquent world. As Hinako steps into her brother's shoes, she must navigate the challenges of concealing her identity and vying for control of the school. Amidst a sea of handsome, rough-and-tumble boys who prefer fists over feelings, can Hinako find romance and rise to become the new leader of Shishiku Academy? Discover the thrilling journey in Kenka Banchou Otome - Girl Beats Boys.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
